Manager Job at Staffora Global Limited




        
    

        
        Staffora Global Limited - Our client in the automobile industry is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Manager

Job Location: Jakande, Lekki, Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Automobile Sales (New & Foreign Used Cars)

Job Summary


	Our client is seeking a reliable and hardworking Manager to oversee the company’s daily activities.
	The ideal candidate will ensure smooth operations, manage staff, support sales activities, and help drive customer satisfaction and business growth.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Oversee day-to-day operations of the automobile business
	Coordinate sales activities for new and foreign-used vehicles
	Supervise staff and ensure productivity and professionalism
	Manage inventory of vehicles and track availability
	Ensure excellent customer service and handle escalations when necessary
	Support the implementation of trade-in and promotional initiatives
	Maintain basic records, reports, and operational processes
	Ensure compliance with company policies and operational standards


Requirements


	HND / Bachelor’s Degree Required
	Previous experience in automobile sales or operations management is an advantage
	Strong leadership and organizational skills
	Good communication and customer service skills
	Basic knowledge of vehicle sales processes
	Ability to work independently and make sound decisions.


Salary
N150,000 Monthly.
